example.parse: (VP (PV_PASS+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS أُغْرَمِت) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هٰذِهِ)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الكِلْمَة)))))) (SUB_CONJ فَ) (S (NP-TPC-3 (PRON_3FS هِيَّ)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3FS+IV تِسَمَع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:3FS ها)) (PP (PRT (PREP إِلّا)) (PREP فِي) (NP (DET+NOUN الافْلام) (CONJ وَ) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL المُسَلْسَلات)))))
